fields.name: aa_mutation
fields.label: Changes at amino acid level. Indicate the reference aa, position and mutation aa.

fields.label: Changes in coding sequence.  Indicate position, reference base and mutation base.

fields.label: Protein domain containing the mutation/variation.  Use Pfam accession.

fields.label: Gene(s) containing the mutation/variation.

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

fields.name: procedure_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and procedure, in days

fields.name: procedure_type
fields.label: Controlled vocabulary description of the procedure type. Vocabulary can be extended by disease-specific projects. Prefix extensions with 3-digit center code, e.g. 008.1 Beijing Cancer Hospital, fine needle aspiration of primary

fields.name: procedure_site
fields.label: Anatomical site of the procedure. This must use a standard controlled vocabulary which should be reported in advance to the DCC.

fields.name: resection_status
fields.label: For resection procedures, an indication of the extent of residual disease.

fields.name: specimen_id
fields.label: ID of ICGC specimen resulting from procedure. If present, must match specimen_id in specimen data file.

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the analysis performed for a particular group of samples

fields.label: Unique identifier for the sample being analyzed

fields.label: Version of reference genome assembly (#)

fields.name: gene_build_version
fields.label: Version of Ensembl gene build used for annotation

fields.name: platform
fields.label: Platform or technology used in detecting the expression

fields.label: Name of experimental protocol and URL to written protocol

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identfier for the analysis performed for a particular group of samples

fields.name: control_sample_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the control sample

fields.name: variation_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the variation

fields.name: consequence_type
fields.label: Functional consequence of the SNP.  If multiple transcripts are involved, separate multiple consequences by commas. (#)

fields.name: aa_variation
fields.label: Changes at amino acid level. Indicate the reference aa, position and variation aa.  If multiple transcripts are involved, separate multiple aa variation by commas.

fields.name: cds_variation
fields.label: Changes in coding sequence.  Indicate position, reference base and variation base.  If multiple transcripts are involved, separate multiple cds variation by commas.

fields.name: protein_domain_affected
fields.label: Protein domain containing the mutation/variation.  Use Pfam accession.  If multiple transcripts are involved, separate multiple domains by commas.

fields.name: gene_affected
fields.label: Gene(s) containing the mutation/variation.  Use Ensembl gene id. Separate multiple genes with vertical bars in the form of geneA|geneB|geneC.  If no gene is affected, use -888 (not applicable).

fields.name: transcript_affected
fields.label: Transcript(s) containing the mutation/variation.  Use Ensembl transcript id. Separate multiple transcripts from the same gene with commas, and separate transcripts from different genes with vertical bars. eg. transcriptA1, transcriptA2|transcriptB1|transcriptC1,transcriptC2,transcriptC3.  If no transcript is affected, use -888 (not applicable).

fields.name: gene_build_version
fields.label: Version of Ensembl gene build used for annotation

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the sample assigned by data provider.

fields.name: specimen_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the specimen assigned by data provider. The corresponding specimen idmust appear in the specimen data submission file.

fields.name: analyzed_sample_type
fields.label: Controlled vocabulary description of sample type.

fields.name: analyzed_sample_type_other
fields.label: Free text description of site of sample if 'other' was specified in sample_type field.

fields.name: analyzed_sample_interval
fields.label: Interval from specimen acquisition to sample use in an analytic procedure (e.g. DNA extraction), in days

fields.name: analyzed_sample_notes
fields.label: Freetext notes about sample allowed

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identfier for the analysis performed for a particular group of samples

fields.name: sample_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the sample being analyzed

fields.name: gene_stable_id
fields.label: For annotated gene, use Ensembl gene ID.  Otherwise, use assemblyBuild_chr_start_end where assemblyBuild is hg18 or hg19.

fields.name: gene_chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the mRNA

fields.name: gene_strand
fields.label: Strand of the chromosome

fields.name: gene_start
fields.label: Start position of the gene on the chromosome

fields.name: gene_end
fields.label: End position of the transcript on the chromosome

fields.name: normalized_read_count
fields.label: Normalized count of sequencing reads if analyzed by sequencing platforms

fields.name: raw_read_count
fields.label: Raw count of sequencing reads if analyzed by sequencing platforms

fields.name: normalized_expression_level
fields.label: Normalized value of expression level if analyzed by microarray platforms

fields.label: Expressed fold change if differential expression is measured

fields.name: reference_sample
fields.label: ID of the reference sample if differential expression is measured

fields.label: Quality score for the expression call

fields.label: Probability of the expression call

fields.label: Indicate if the expressed fragment is annotated in Ensembl

fields.name: validation_platform

fields.label: ID of the probeset used in microarray

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identfier for the analysis performed for a particular group of samples

fields.name: sv_id
fields.label: Unique variant id (institute wide). One id per single event

fields.name: placement
fields.label: Ordering of breakpoint pairs within a single structural mutation/variation event

fields.name: annotation
fields.label: Annotation describing sequence mutation/variation based on breakpoint pairs

fields.name: interpreted_annotation
fields.label: HGVS nomenclature for description of sequence mutation/variation. E.g. chr3:g.1234567-2345678inv.

fields.name: variant_type
fields.label: Type of mutation/variation

fields.name: chr_from
fields.label: Name of the donor chromosome containing the mutation/variation

fields.name: chr_from_bkpt
fields.label: Breakpoint position of the mutation/variation on the donor chromosome

fields.name: chr_from_strand
fields.label: Donor chromome strand

fields.name: chr_from_range
fields.label: Number of bases around chr_from_bkpt that may contain the real breakpoint

fields.name: chr_from_flanking_seq
fields.label: Flanking sequences that are 200bp upstream and 200bp downstream to the chr_from_bkpt position.

fields.name: chr_to
fields.label: Name of the acceptor chromosome containing the mutation/variation

fields.name: chr_to_bkpt
fields.label: Breakpoint position of the mutation/variation on the acceptor chromosome

fields.name: chr_to_strand
fields.label: Acceptor chromome strand

fields.name: chr_to_range
fields.label: Number of bases around chr_to_bkpt that may contain the real breakpoint

fields.name: chr_to_flanking_seq
fields.label: Flanking sequences that are 200bp upstream and 200bp downstream to the chr_to_bkpt position.

fields.name: microhomology_sequence
fields.label: If a microhomology is inserted, provide sequence

fields.name: non_templated_sequence
fields.label: If non-templated DNA is inserted, provide sequence

fields.name: evidence
fields.label: Evidence supporting a structural mutation/variation

fields.name: quality_score
fields.label: Quality score for the mutation/variation call

fields.name: probability
fields.label: Probability of the mutation/variation call

fields.name: zygosity
fields.label: Zygosity

fields.name: validation_status
fields.label: Indicate if the mutation/variation has been validated

fields.name: validation_platform
fields.label: Platform or technology used in validation

fields.name: db_xref
fields.label: Value code of cross-reference database:ID of the mutation in the cross-reference database.  Separate multiple entries by commas.

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes

fields.name: gene_affected
fields.label: Gene(s) affected by the breakpoints.  Use Ensembl gene id.  Separate multiple genes with vertical bars in the form of geneA|geneB|geneC. If both breakpoints affect genes, then use | to separate them.  If no gene is affected, use -888 (not applicable).

fields.name: transcript_affected
fields.label: Transcript(s) affected by the breakpoints. Use Ensembl transcript id.  Separate multiple transcripts from the same gene with commas, and separate transcripts from different genes with vertical bars. eg. transcriptA1, transcriptA2|transcriptB1|transcriptC1

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identfier for the analysis performed for a particular group of samples

fields.name: sv_id
fields.label: Unique variant id (institute wide). One id per single event

fields.name: placement
fields.label: Ordering of breakpoint pairs within a single structural change event

fields.name: bkpt_from_context
fields.label: Contextual description of the first break location (Exonic, Intronic, Intergenic)

fields.name: bkpt_to_context
fields.label: Contextual description of the second break location (Exonic, Intronic, Intergenic)

fields.name: exposure_intensity
fields.label: Extent of the exposure. This is a controlled vocabulary term to be developed by the submitting group. Units to be specified by submitting group.

fields.name: exposure_notes
fields.label: Free text notes.

fields.name: probability
fields.label: Probability of the mutation/variation call

fields.name: read_count
fields.label: Average number of times the bases are covered by raw reads

fields.name: is_annotated
fields.label: Indicate if the mutation/variation is annotated in dbSNP

fields.name: validation_status
fields.label: Indicate if the mutation/variation has been validated

fields.name: validation_platform
fields.label: Platform or technology used in validation

fields.name: xref_ensembl_var_id
fields.label: Cross-reference: Ensembl Variation ID

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

fields.name: specimen_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the specimen assigned by data provider.

fields.name: specimen_type
fields.label: Controlled vocabulary description of specimen type.

fields.name: specimen_type_other
fields.label: Free text description of site of specimen if 'normal control (other)' or 'tumour (other)' was specified in specimen_type field.

fields.name: specimen_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and specimen acquisition, in days

fields.name: specimen_donor_treatment_type
fields.label: Type of treatment the donor received prior to specimen acquisition.

fields.name: specimen_donor_treatment_type_other
fields.label: If 'other' therapy indicated in previous column, describe it here. eg: molecular

fields.name: specimen_processing
fields.label: Description of technique used to process specimen

fields.name: specimen_processing_other
fields.label: If 'other' specified for specimen_processing, may indicate technique here.

fields.name: specimen_storage
fields.label: Description of how specimen was stored. For specimens that were extracted freshly or immediately cultured, answer (1) 'NA'.

fields.name: specimen_storage_other
fields.label: If 'other' specified for specimen_storage, may indicate technique here.

fields.name: tumour_confirmed
fields.label: Whether tumour was confirmed in the specimen by histological examination.

fields.name: specimen_biobank
fields.label: If the specimen was obtained from a biobank, provide the biobank name here

fields.name: specimen_biobank_id
fields.label: If the specimen was obtained from a biobank, provide the biobank accession number here.

fields.name: specimen_available
fields.label: Whether additional tissue is available for followup studies.

fields.name: tumour_histological_type
fields.label: 'WHO International Histological Classification of Tumours' code

fields.name: tumour_grading_system
fields.label: Name of tumour grading system

fields.name: tumour_grade
fields.label: Tumour grade using indicated grading system

fields.name: tumour_grade_supplemental
fields.label: Optional additional grading provided as a comma-delimited list of 'grading system:grade'

fields.name: tumour_stage_system
fields.label: Name of tumour staging system used

fields.name: tumour_stage
fields.label: Pathological tumour stage value using indicated staging system

fields.name: tumour_stage_supplemental
fields.label: Optional additional staging provided as a comma-delimited list of 'staging system:stage'

fields.name: digital_image_of_stained_section
fields.label: Linkout(s) to digital image of a stained section, demonstrating a representative section of tumour

fields.name: specimen_notes
fields.label: Free text notes allowed

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

fields.name: therapy_start_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and initiation of therapy, in days

fields.name: therapy_duration
fields.label: Duration of therapy, in days

fields.name: therapy_type
fields.label: Name of therapy

fields.name: therapy_response
fields.label: What was the clinical effect of the therapy?

fields.name: therapy_notes
fields.label: Further description of therapy, such as dosing schedule.

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identfier for the analysis performed for a particular group of samples

fields.name: sample_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the sample being analyzed

fields.name: junction_id
fields.label: For known exons, use exonID1_exonID2 where exonID1 and exonID2 are Ensembl IDs of the 5' and 3' exons, respectively.  For novel or putative exons, use assemblyBuild_exon1chr_exon1end_exon2chr_exon2start where assemblyBuild is hg18 or hg19; exon1chr and exone2chr are the chromosomes of the 5' and 3' exons, respectively; exon1end is the end position of the 5'exon; exon2start is the start position of the 3'exon.

fields.name: gene_stable_id
fields.label: Stable ID of the gene containing the 5' exon at the junction.  For annotated gene, use Ensembl gene ID.  For putative and novel gene, use assemblyBuild_chr_start_end where assemblyBuild can be hg18 or hg19.

fields.name: gene_chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the above gene.

fields.name: gene_strand
fields.label: Strand of the chromosome

fields.name: gene_start
fields.label: Start position of the entire gene on the chromosome as annotated in Ensembl

fields.name: gene_end
fields.label: End position of the entire gene on the chromosome as annotated in Ensembl

fields.name: second_gene_stable_id
fields.label: In the case of a fusion gene, provide the Stable ID of the gene containing the 3' exon at the junction.  For annotated genes, use Ensembl gene ID.  For putative and novel genes, use assemblyBuild_chr_start_end where assemblyBuild can be hg18 or hg19.

fields.name: exon1_chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the 5' exon (#)

fields.name: exon1_number_bases
fields.label: Number of bases from 5' exon

fields.name: exon1_end
fields.label: End position of the 5' exon on the chromosome

fields.name: exon1_strand
fields.label: Chromsome strand of the 5' exon

fields.name: exon2_chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the 3' exon (#)

fields.name: exon2_number_bases
fields.label: Number of bases from 3' exon

fields.name: exon2_start
fields.label: Start position of the 3' exon on the chromosome

fields.name: exon2_strand
fields.label: Chromsome strand of the 3' exon

fields.name: is_fusion_gene
fields.label: Indicate if the function is the result of a fusion gene

fields.name: is_novel_splice_form
fields.label: Indicate if the splice form is novel

fields.name: junction_seq
fields.label: Provide junction sequence if either is_fusion_gene or is_novel_splice_form is true

fields.name: junction_type
fields.label: Type of junction

fields.name: junction_read_count
fields.label: Count of sequencing reads that span across exons

fields.name: quality_score
fields.label: Quality score for the junction call

fields.name: probability
fields.label: Probability of the junction call

fields.name: validation_status
fields.label: Indicate if the junction has been validated

fields.name: validation_platform
fields.label: Platform or technology used in validation

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider.

fields.name: donor_sex
fields.label: Donor biological sex. 'Other' has been removed from the controlled vocabulary due to identifiability concerns.

fields.name: donor_region_of_residence
fields.label: Country, and optionally state or province code, but not city.

fields.name: donor_vital_status
fields.label: Donor's last known vital status

fields.name: disease_status_last_followup
fields.label: Donor's last known disease status.

fields.name: donor_relapse_type
fields.label: Type of relapse or progression (for liquid tumours), if applicable

fields.name: donor_age_at_diagnosis
fields.label: Age at primary diagnosis.

fields.name: donor_age_at_enrollment
fields.label: Age at which first specimen was collected.

fields.name: donor_age_at_last_followup
fields.label: Age at last followup

fields.name: donor_relapse_interval
fields.label: If donor was clinically disease free following primary therapy and relapse or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred, length of disease free interval, in days.

fields.name: donor_diagnosis_icd10
fields.label: ICD-10 diagnostic code

fields.name: donor_tumour_staging_system_at_diagnosis
fields.label: Clinical staging system used at time of diagnosis, if determined. Note that this is supplementary to specimen's pathological staging.

fields.name: donor_tumour_stage_at_diagnosis
fields.label: Stage at diagnosis using indicated staging system. Note that this is supplementary to specimen's pathological staging.

fields.name: donor_tumour_stage_at_diagnosis_supplemental
fields.label: Optional additional staging provided as a comma-delimited list of 'staging system:stage'

fields.name: donor_survival_time
fields.label: How long has donor survived since primary diagnosis, in days. If source data was collected in months, use a multiplier value of '30.44' to convert value to days when preparing submission.

fields.name: donor_interval_of_last_followup
fields.label: Interval from primary diagnosis to last followup date. ICGC requests that patients be followed up every 6 months while alive.

fields.name: donor_notes
fields.label: Free text notes concerning donor

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identfier for the analysis performed for a particular group of samples

fields.name: matched_sample_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the control matched to the tumour sample

fields.name: assembly_version
fields.label: Version of reference genome assembly

fields.name: platform
fields.label: Platform or technology used in detecting the mutation/variation

fields.name: experimental_protocol
fields.label: Name of experimental protocol and URL to written protocol

fields.name: base_calling_algorithm
fields.label: Name of base calling algorithm and URL to written protocol

fields.name: alignment_algorithm
fields.label: Name of alignment algorithm and URL to written protocol

fields.name: variation_calling_algorithm
fields.label: Name of variation calling algorithm and URL to written protocol

fields.name: other_analysis_algorithm
fields.label: Names of other analysis algorithms.  Separate multiple algorithms by commas.

fields.name: seq_coverage
fields.label: Sequence coverage if analyzed by sequencing platforms

fields.name: raw_data_repository
fields.label: Public repository where raw data is submitted (#)

fields.name: raw_data_accession
fields.label: Accession and URL for referencing the raw data at the public repository

fields.name: note
fields.label: Optional field to leave notes
